::Halucigen::
Halucigen gott he message through a direct link with Cygnars head he 
had created as soon as Cygnar saw the picture.  With strain he 
managed to shift on gear in his scorpion tail as a drip after drip 
seeped out and on everyone melting a small hole in the floor that got 
larger and larger. Soon he would be free.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Wilthram Ponth" <Rudra656@a...> wrote:
> OOC: True but it still fits the plot better.
> 
> ::Cygnar::
>     He recieves the message from Halucigen.  He concentrates on 
> thumbs up.  As a reserve plan he tries to shout.  "Go."
